name: Super Speedtest Xtreme 3000
description:
A little gag game that spawned out of a gamejam project.

Click on the START button or hit space to start the game. Gameplay is as simple as clicking the coloured buttons in the order they light up at an increasing speed. The length of the experience may vary from 5 to 30 minutes depending on one's performance.

If you find yourself having too much trouble beating the game, give everyone's favourite cheat-code a try! ;)

Credits for assets used:
All graphical assets are original.

Music: XTaKeRuX - Beast but not least!
Sound effects by: Euphrosyyn, Breviceps, CBJ_Student, simkiott, Wakerone, Hykenfreak
